name: Isidro
description: Isidro, a young and energetic thief with dreams of becoming a great swordsman, joins Guts' group and embarks on a journey of growth and self-discovery. His youthful exuberance and determination provide a refreshing contrast to the often somber and grim atmosphere of Berserk. Isidro's character arc is one of learning and mentorship as he seeks to absorb the wisdom and combat skills of Guts. His presence adds a sense of hope and optimism to the story, demonstrating that even in the darkest of times, there can be moments of aspiration and growth.

name: Ivalera
description: Ivalera, the mischievous wind spirit who accompanies Schierke, adds a whimsical and ethereal element to the story. With her playful personality and interactions with other members of Guts' group, Ivalera injects moments of lightness and humor into the otherwise grim and perilous journey. Her presence serves as a reminder that even in a world filled with darkness and danger, there can be moments of enchantment and wonder.
